description: This file defines a 'Home' component using the Lightning.js framework and Blits library. It imports external components and assets, sets up a visual template with animations and transitions, and includes internal state, hooks, and methods for behavior control.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the home page with animated elements, loaders, and buttons, utilizing Blits component architecture.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: A method to cycle through predefined color options at a specified interval, updating the component's color state.
